thread.title_full: PICTURED: Britain's most hated mum Karen Matthews | Daily Mail Online

author: Jake Wallis Simons
title: PICTURED: Britain's most hated mum Karen Matthews | Daily Mail Online
text: PICTURED: Britain's most hated mum Karen Matthews tucks into £6.50 roast dinner at Toby Carvery with friends from church amid anger over daughter Shannon’s BBC kidnap drama Karen Matthews, 41, faked her nine-year-old daughter Shannon kidnap in 2008 Mother-of-seven has served four years in prison and now goes by the name Kate She claims to have 'found God' in jail and now works in a Christian charity shop Matthews now regularly meets support group of religious activists in local café Originally from Dewsbury, West Yorkshire, she now lives in the south of England Said to 'fear for her life' after BBC drama about fake kidnapping aired last week
